channel.title: Community FM 3 Polls
channel.description:
# Important Details
CFM3 is a large game for our site. We expect 21+ people to join, and there is no limit to the amount of people who can play. (For reference, last year had 31 players!)
This game will have In-Thread-Attacks (ITAs) with a base accuracy of 10%. There may or may not be other forms of day killpower. There will also be events. It'll be pretty mash-like. (Longer days can get exhausting)
We will not be doing any phase lengths other than the options listed. Sorry if you wanted something else ):
The game will begin mid-June.
The following polls' results *are not public.* Voting just to see the results won't work. Please vote seriously.
[poll name=poll3 type=regular results=staff_only public=true chartType=bar close=2021-05-30T07:00:00.000Z] # Do you plan on playing in CFM3? * Yes * No * Maybe [/poll]
[poll type=multiple results=staff_only min=1 max=2 public=true chartType=bar close=2021-05-30T07:00:00.000Z] # Which phase length do you prefer? * 24/24 * 36/12 [/poll]
Please vote in the following polls *regardless* of your choice(s) in the last poll. Keep in mind that 36/12 will have a different SoD and EoD time (12h apart):
[poll name=poll2 type=multiple results=staff_only min=1 max=16 public=true chartType=bar close=2021-05-30T07:00:00.000Z] # Which SoD/EoD times do you prefer for 24/24? (PDT is UTC -7) * 9am PDT * 10am PDT * 11am PDT * 12pm PDT * 1pm PDT * 2pm PDT * 3pm PDT * 4pm PDT * 5pm PDT * 6pm PDT * 7pm PDT * 8pm PDT * 9pm PDT * 10pm PDT * 11pm PDT * 12am PDT [/poll]
[poll name=poll4 type=multiple results=staff_only min=1 max=8 public=true chartType=bar] # Which SoD time do you prefer for 36/12? (PDT is UTC-7) * 9am PDT * 10am PDT * 11am PDT * 12pm PDT * 9pm PDT * 10pm PDT * 11pm PDT * 12am PDT [/poll]
### Thread is closed because we're bad people <3 DM us with any questions you may have (@Chloe, @DatBird, @Geyde)

item.title: Community FM 3 Polls

item.description:
Bump

Polls close in a little over a day

Thanks, frens (:

item.title: Community FM 3 Polls
item.dc:creator: Chloe
item.description:
Even if you don’t want to play with that phase-length please vote for what SoD time would be best for you if you had to play with that phase-length !!!

ty!!

Read full topic

item.title: Community FM 3 Polls
item.dc:creator: Chloe
item.description:
Important Details

CFM3 is a large game for our site. We expect 21+ people to join, and there is no limit to the amount of people who can play. (For reference, last year had 31 players!)

This game will have In-Thread-Attacks (ITAs) with a base accuracy of 10%. There may or may not be other forms of day killpower. There will also be events. It’ll be pretty mash-like. (Longer days can get exhausting)

We will not be doing any phase lengths other than the options listed. Sorry if you wanted something else ):

The game will begin mid-June.

The following polls’ results are not public. Voting just to see the results won’t work. Please vote seriously.

Do you plan on playing in CFM3?
  • Yes
  • No
  • Maybe

0 voters

Which phase length do you prefer?
  • 24/24
  • 36/12

0 voters

Please vote in the following polls regardless of your choice(s) in the last poll. Keep in mind that 36/12 will have a different SoD and EoD time (12h apart):

Which SoD/EoD times do you prefer for 24/24? (PDT is UTC -7)
  • 9am PDT
  • 10am PDT
  • 11am PDT
  • 12pm PDT
  • 1pm PDT
  • 2pm PDT
  • 3pm PDT
  • 4pm PDT
  • 5pm PDT
  • 6pm PDT
  • 7pm PDT
  • 8pm PDT
  • 9pm PDT
  • 10pm PDT
  • 11pm PDT
  • 12am PDT

0 voters

Which SoD time do you prefer for 36/12? (PDT is UTC-7)
  • 9am PDT
  • 10am PDT
  • 11am PDT
  • 12pm PDT
  • 9pm PDT
  • 10pm PDT
  • 11pm PDT
  • 12am PDT

0 voters

Thread is closed because we’re bad people <3

DM us with any questions you may have (@Chloe, @DatBird, @Geyde)

Read full topic
